website_summaries.verdict: Nikon's budget-friendly Coolpix S4000 offers up a large, responsive touch screen, but its performance will test your patience.

customer_reviews.title: CAMERA WORKS GREAT BUT NEEDED ADD-ONS
customer_reviews.text: I'M PLEASED WITH THE CONDITION AND OPERATION OF THE CAMERA. I JUST WISH IT CAME WITH A MANUAL AND POSSIBLY A CHARGER. I PURCHASED THE CHARGER, A CASE, MEMORY CARD, AND CABLE AND DOWNLOADED THE MANUAL AND WAS THEN SET. I USED IT FIRST TO TAKE PICTURES OF MY LAWN TRACTOR THROTTLE LINKAGE TO HELP ME TSHOOT IT AND PICS WERE GREAT. ZOOMED IN THEY STAYED CLEAR AND ALL WERE TAKEN ON AUTO SETTING.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn T. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Too bad they don’t make this model anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I felt lucky to find this used one. I bought this one to replace one I had that had some issues...kids. I love this little camera!
customer_reviews.author: Margie Spry

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I have another bigger camera with more creative options which I love for vacations and scenery, but I really wanted a camera that I could always carry in my purse or pocket to capture life's fun moments. I find it easier to take pictures of people when they aren't intimidated by a bigger camera. This is fun and easy to use and the touch screen is great. It has a lot of amazing features, too. My only complaint is that I would like a hard copy of the instruction manual instead of on a CD. I like to browse through it at my leisure.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B. Holstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera and great value
customer_reviews.text: the nikon coolpix s4000 is a great camera. pictures come out really good for something in this price range. they don't look like the ones from a SLR but thats what you get for $120. the touch screen is good, not great but the stylus really helps. i wish they had mad a slot in the camera body to insert the stylus. the speed is great and response time is fast. i also like the in camera picture editing software. i wish nikon had included a better panorama option instead of the "assist". it needs something like sony's sweep panorama. i have had it for about a month and no problems have occured yet.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had this camera used for about 5 or 6 years before it gave out. Best digital camera ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: anonomous

customer_reviews.title: Neatest Camera Ever
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera after having read the reviews and I've never seen a camera so full of features! I was amazed by the touch screen and the clarity/sharpness of the pics I took. Love the video/audio feature as well. The battery died after about 15 hours and it was so easy to recharge...took approx. 2 hours for full recharge. I'm not a professional photographer, barely an amateur, but I know that Nikon is an excellent brand and so far this camera has just amazed me!! And I have so much more to learn about it!!!
customer_reviews.author: artmuffin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pictures from Nikon
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure if I wanted to purchase a touch screen camera. Reservations are gone! Love the automatic point-and-shoot feature. It picks the right setting whether indoors or out to create beautiful pics. I purchased this one because I can use my memory card and batteries from my old camera and the carrying case (I should have left my old camera in the case instead of tossing into center arm rest and crushing it). The Nikon fits nicely in my pocket to take unposed interesting pictures of family and places of interest. The touch screen makes it very simple to view pictures after they are taken. Thank You Nikon!
customer_reviews.author: Val En Tine

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprising.
customer_reviews.text: This little camera performs all out of proportion to its size and price. A good friend uses one, and that's why I bought mine. My friend does some outstanding Macro with this little pocket camera. It's user friendly, and I'm glad I bought it. My girlfriend is impressed with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Harold T. Read

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this camera!!
customer_reviews.text: i myself have the nikon cool pix s3000 and bought this for my husband as a present i now find myself stealing his camera to take pictures! i love this camera. the picutres it takes are AWESOME!!! i would buy this camera over and over again. and the touch screen is sooo coool- when i post pictures to my facebook people cant believe i took the pictures and not a professional!
customer_reviews.author: ArmyWife07

customer_reviews.title: Dad's Hindsight Review
customer_reviews.text: 4 out of 5 stars: Bought 7 years ago. 1/1 Star: We bought it. 1/1 Star: Met expectations. 1/1 Star: Used more than a few times. 1/1 Star: We still own it. 0/1 Star: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dad's Hindsight Review

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Takes sharp, clear pictures at normal distances. Close ups of small objects are very blurry. I had hoped that 12 MP would be enough to overcome the tendency of blurring close-ups. As long as you don't need it for close-ups of smaller objects, it's a great little camera.
customer_reviews.author: BabyBlueOnes

customer_reviews.title: very good product but problem with card reader
customer_reviews.text: this product is very gud as expected, but it does not work when i inserted 16 GB SDHC card class 10....it works in the movie format of 320p but not on HD of 720P or 640p..whenever i tried to use the video in those mode, the msg appears" card cannot be read."...if u r thinking of using the video in HD,then think again, otherwise the camera is the best in this price..pictures r perfect and clear at night time too.
customer_reviews.author: Binayak Joshi

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: GREAT CAMERA, I LIKE A CAMERA THAT IS EASY TO USE. THIS ONE WAS GREAT AND I LOVED THE TOUCH SCREEN. WHY THEY DON'T PUT ON ALL MODELS I NOT UNDERSTAND. NEVER HAD ANY PROBLEMS. WILL BUY ANOTHER AS SOON ASI GET BACK TO STATES. I WAS RELIEVED OF MINE ON THE OVER CROWDED TRAINS IN THE PHILIPPINES.AT LEAST THEY DIDN'T GET THE CHARGER.
customer_reviews.author: leon sikes

customer_reviews.title: Happy Daughter
customer_reviews.text: I went on line and found this product within minutes. I Never left home and I never stood in line. I was very pleased when it arrived so fast and the product was exactly as described. I would absolutely recommend this seller due to the outstanding customer service I received
customer_reviews.author: David O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This camera was a much-anticipated gift for my daughter. Unfortunately, it has been a huge disappointment! The camera is not very user-friendly, the pictures are generally blurry, and the camera broke within the first couple of months of use. It has been sent off to Nikon for repairs two times, and the last time, Nikon refused to honor the warranty. The camera erased pictures from the memory card, the lens would stick frequently, the zoom causes the camera to shut-off and brings up a 'lens-error'. I know that Nikon is a name brand, but their customer service is terrible. I would discourage anyone from buying this camera. My daughter is saving her money for a Cannon.
customer_reviews.author: mwalk

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Reading the directions gave me a headache so after a couple of days of regret I just started to take some pictures-- What great clear shots with super easy point and shoot. I let the camera decide about light and they came out great. I will do more as time goes by and reread the direction and learn all the function that this very nice camera has.
customer_reviews.author: Connie A. Pietrala

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: I received the camera and as the seller said, it is in excellent condition and works fine! Thanks a lot for a nice bargain.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: This camera is everything I wanted.  It's easy to use and small enough to carry in my purse.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is everything I wanted in a camera. It's easy to use and small enough to carry in my purse so I always have it with me. Having 7 grandchildren that's a plus! I read the reviews on Amazon.com before purchasing and I've found all the pluses I read about. My hands shake a lot but with the anti-shake gizmo my pictures come out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: c parsons

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased as punch with this camera. I struggled for years with a Kodak digital camera that was the most un-user friendly piece of junk ever. I finally broke down and bough the Nikon S4000 to replace the Kodak junker. Wow !! What a difference. Great pics and so easy to use. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: horsespatoot

customer_reviews.title: A HUGE Waste of Time and Money!  Bad, bad, bad!
customer_reviews.text: This was the BIGGEST waste of $70 ever. When I would attempt to contact the company to complain, I could never get through to them. The CAMERA never worked! I'm no Einstein, however, in order for a camera to take pictures, I believe it HAS to work. Is this true? I am really very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T. Black

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Review
customer_reviews.text: I am writing on behalf of my 14 year old, I bought this for her birthday a couple of months ago and all of my exposure to this camera has been wonderful. She found it herself after reading tons of reviews, we think she picked a winner. She has taken around 300 photo's and they all look great.
customer_reviews.author: Mastercraft

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter's 16th Birthday and she absolutely loves it. It is small enough it fits in her pocket like her cellphone and she takes it everywhere. She really likes that she can write on the pictures with the stylus and put in captions. The touchscreen makes it very easy to use and takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: JennyB

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a friend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend. I haven't used it personally but he says he really likes it. The one thing he found a bit difficult was using the touch screen with just a finger, it was slow and unresponsive to touch, but he said when using the stylus that comes with it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: a_WI_guy

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix is def cool
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It takes great pics. It is sleek and stylish. I only have 1 complaint. I ordered the red one and it doesn't really look red, more like a magenta color. I got it in red so both my husband and I could use it, but I don't think my husband will want to carry it around since it sorta looks like a hot pink color, but I love it. very cool for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the camera for a trip to Israel and only had one complaint: the life of the battery is too short. By the end of the day taking pictures and recording short videos, the battery, (which I charged nightly), pooped out. The camera was very easy to use, which was a real plus, and the photo's captured were brilliant and clear. The pictures taken while in motion, i.e. while our tour bus was moving didn't fair so well. Those photo's were all a bit hazy with the glare of sunlight and the reflection of the glass. But all in all, I'd make the same purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Wellness is a lifestyle

customer_reviews.title: Nikon S4000 Coolpix
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my Nikon S4000 Coolpix camera, it is very portable and user friendly. A must have when you go on vacation. My husband and I both used it on our recent vacation and it was great, took a ton of pictures of excellent quality. Who knew a tiny, cute camera would take such great pictures. My daughters both have one and they are also very happy with it. I am impressed with the drop in price which makes them a lot more enticing.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera, hate the battery and some features
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera as far as the quality of the pictures. However, the battery stinks and sometimes it gets into a mode and no matter what I hit on the screen I can't get it back. Otherwise, it's a good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My wife really loves this camera. She likes the color, size, picture quality and touch screen. She can take it in her purse and have a camera on hand when the kids have a momet you want to capture right then and there.
customer_reviews.author: FamFun

customer_reviews.title: Waht can I say - It's a Nikon!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Great pictures and easy to work with. Have taken about 5000 pictures with it and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Anderse

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT CAMERA. CAME WITH ALL THE EXTRAS. SELLERS WERE VERY HELPFUL IN EXPLAINING HOW IT WORKS TO ME. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera. It takes very clear pictures. Im so happy about the shipping and how fast it was delivered to me. I definently would order from this place again. This camera is awesome!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Relative poor performance in mechanical system
customer_reviews.text: I have this camera for couple weeks. Two problems 1) Auto focus is not sharp (sometime it works and sometime does not, this machine only has auto_focus mode) 2) Sometime push on power the camera lense out then goes back, you need shut power off and on again. It seems that the machine's mechanical system has some problem. 'Touch screen' works fine. It is quite simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Nice features, Unacceptable picture quality
customer_reviews.text: The camera is very easy to use and has nice set of features, but the photo quality is very low (specialty in low light). The pictures are grainy even in good light conditions. My 4 year old 8MP Canon, makes much better pictures. Update: The battery died after about a year of very light use - won't hold charge for more than a week. Total waste of money....
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: and the quality of pictures to long distance is bad. However its easy to carry and good for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for the price but the zoom was ruined after some uses, and the quality of pictures to long distance is bad. However its easy to carry and good for taking pictures to people.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Pastor

customer_reviews.title: Poor After Sales Service
customer_reviews.text: Had bought this Camera, expecting it to last longer than 04 months, after which it started giving defected images. Called the customer service department of Nikon who asked me to submit defected images online, which the camera was taking. This I had to do twice. Than I was asked to send the camera for repairs. I was expecting the camera to be repaired and delivered back, instead of repairing this camera under warranty the company charged me $108/-!!! Will never buy a Nikon camer again!.
customer_reviews.author: Faisal

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Camera
customer_reviews.text: I take a lot of pictures, and after my last Coolpix died, I replaced it with this. It sucks. It's not usable. The picture quality it terrible. Only one out of ten shots isn't blurry - and I've tried adjusting everything. The pictures just are not clear no matter what I do. Add to that the fact that I had to warranty the first one after a month or two because the lens stopped working, and now the battery won't keep a charge... My three year old cell phone takes better pictures and is more reliable. Oh, and the video on this camera never worked for me. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: NKW

customer_reviews.title: Most shots were underexposed
customer_reviews.text: Always had good luck with Canon Powershots, but decided to give a Nikon P&S a try. Out of the first fifty test shots well over half the pics were underexposed or otherwise messed up. Very disappointing performance that makes me wonder whether a recent Nikon D5000 purchase without considering a Canon DSLR was a wise move. Returned for athat produced great pic after great pic during a two week vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: It takes decent pictures but the touch screen doesn't work great and requires multiple touches sometimes t execute your command.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: We have always owned very bulky, professional & pricey cameras but with children it's so difficult to always carry it around. This camera is perfect! The size is not a reflection of it capabilites! It takes great pictures, very easy to use (a little guide reading involved) and so small you can carry it everywhere you go. We love it and have taken so many more pictures because of it's ease. Best of all, compared to stores around our city and online, we couldn't have gotten a better price!
customer_reviews.author: Fashionistamama

customer_reviews.title: great camera for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the flash on first camera I ordered, but as soon as I takled to Amazon customer service, they had another one to me in the mail the following day and I haven't had a single problem! It takes great pictures, even when you have to zoom. I have had problems in the apst with other cameras where the flash somewhat whites out people's faces, but this flash works very well. Picture quality is very high! I love the camera and all its features!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: nikon coolpix
customer_reviews.text: this was a graduation gift. the student tat received the gift loved the gift and has used it many times since receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Sue Wilburn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera!
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon Coolpix is a wonderful camera! We had to replace ours that went "missing". The newer model with the larger touch screen is a nice improvement. We purchased through Amazon as we could buy it for $30 less than in the local store.
customer_reviews.author: W J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: Camera ended up not working at all. It was used, but failed almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R.

customer_reviews.title: BEST CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It's amazing! It takes very nice pictures, and it has excellent functions. I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Iremlab

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine until about 6 months later when the lens wouldn't open and it wouldn't take pictures
customer_reviews.author: Flincact

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little camera. Takes the best pictures with the least effort.
customer_reviews.author: Milli Denney

customer_reviews.title: easy camera
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an easy to use point and shoot camera and found it with the Nikon Coolpix S4000. I'm very happy with it. It is small and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Green Water Witch

customer_reviews.title: LOVE EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for the price and super easy to use. I recently sold my Cannon digital SLR on craigslist because it was just so big and bulky and to complicated to use. This camera takes just as good pics and video and with the touch screen it is to easy and simple to use. The size is perfect so that I can carry it in my purse and have it with me at all times when that perfect pic or video opportunity should arise
customer_reviews.author: Donna Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera. It takes awesome pictures and great videos. The touch-panel is a great bonus as well. At this price and with this quality, you can't beat it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schafer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for our trip to Amsterdam....I did not want to bring my BIG Nikon camera. Suprisingly this takes GREAT pics, just a little slow when taking back to back pictures. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S4000 12.0MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Vibration...
customer_reviews.text: Nice from many points of view, but the picture quality and color capture were horrible no matter on what setting. I had to send it back. Buy Canon instead.
customer_reviews.author: EmaC

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S4000 12 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Vibration...
customer_reviews.text: Nikon Coolpix S4000 12 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Vibration... That's great! It is very, very good. I am happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: inga

customer_reviews.title: coolpix camera
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to a friend and he loved it and uses it continually. It worked as desired and 'wowed' his family with it. Very happy with this camera in every way.
customer_reviews.author: DavS

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's good and does the job, my friend got a panasonic one with similar specs at 60% of the price. The only real complaint that I have is that when taking videos, sometimes it displays the message "cannot read the card", and everything freezes as if it is running out of battery, although the battery is full (and the card is fine). This happened to me twice so far (I have had the camera for a month now).
customer_reviews.author: Buyer1

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a nikon digital camera because i just loved my canon but when i received my nikon digital camera i loved how it's very easy to use, loved the itouch screen and the video are great as well, the only thing that bother's me is when i take pictures at night the flash is too bright and so my kids doesn't like it when i take their pictures at night, other than that i just loved them. i did my research and amazon has the cheapest price and they shipped pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: msbrownie

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix 5400 12 MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: Pink way cool. Neat camera to fit in your purse when you can't care your larger digital. Great deal too.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L Prorok

customer_reviews.title: Nikon camera
customer_reviews.text: We really like this camera. We used it at the Christmas holidays and it was great. Nice screen for viewing. Our only compaint was receiving it. It took at least a month and a half and we were planning to use it earlier. Amazon was not as supportive as we would have liked on tracking it down.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: I Like It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a really nice camera. Its small and easy to carry with you any place. Love the touch screen, really good feature.
customer_reviews.author: T. Glover

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Had for two years now. Great camera but video function doesn't work right. It will record sometimes but can only be played by vlc player.
customer_reviews.author: Barnold2

customer_reviews.title: handy, easy little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easily slipped into a pocket but is ready for a picture in an instant. Sharp photos and camera is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carol W. Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: When i buy the camera the lens did not open i check you tube and i found the solution for the price was good
customer_reviews.author: Justo

customer_reviews.title: Died after 18 months (Planned obsolescence?)
customer_reviews.text: A couple of months ago (around 18 months after I bought it) I got the "Lens Error" deadlock message. Tomorrow I'll have to send it to service. Digging a little bit I've found that is a very common failure when the lens get jammed (apparently with sand particles). Anyway, not a very recommended camera. :(
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: overall good camera and has an excellent battery lifes
customer_reviews.text: overall good camera and has an excellent battery lifes. This device also has good on screen editing features for a low price camera.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great camera at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera, especially the touch screen. It has great features and it's a great color, I got the red. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lisah1965

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: - - - It's very good and it was as described. If you buy you will not regret! - - -
customer_reviews.author: ggiorgi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This product was generally exactly what I wanted. I have had a few issues with the touch screen, but nothing major. It takes pictures very quickly and they are very clear. I am very very pleased with this purchase. I am in college, so I didn't want anything too spectacular. Just a camera to take pictures of my family and friends. This is perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It was a replacement for the same camera that I lost. So I ordered it because of my familiarity with the product. It's fine for the price, but it's so compact that it's hard to perform some tasks, such as removing/installing the picture card.
customer_reviews.author: retired grandmother

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Great point and shoot for photogs of any experience level. Particularly love the touch screen. Surprisingly easy to use--seeing as I have large fingers. :) Great quality photos and cool features. However, i would have preferred to have a stabilizer for zoomed in shots.
customer_reviews.author: leinani45

customer_reviews.title: Takes fairly good photos
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is not that great. Photos are good. Occasionally it takes longer than normal to save a photo before being ready to take another photo. It was good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one of these particular camera since we dropped and destroyed our first one. The camera is small light and takes a good picture for a point and shoot camera. It was a good purchase and we would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Amazon, pls fix the dimensions
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a small camera for my husband. The product dimensions listed are 4 x 7 x 6 inches. This was way too big. I finally called a camera shop and asked what the dimensions are. They said 3 x 2 inches (approx,). I bought the camera. Amazon please correct your dimensions. We haven't taken a lot of pics yet but so far we like the camera. I just got frustrated with the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Nestor

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this camera is a great buy. It takes bright, beautiful photos and videos. However, The memory card that Amazon bundled with mine does not read when trying to take videos so it may need a different brand memory card than sandisk. Other than that, no complaints whatsoever. Nikon is a great brand and deserves credit for such a product.
customer_reviews.author: ferg

customer_reviews.title: Good -- Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera to replace the Coolpix S3000 that I lost a few months prior. I like the design and think it is relatively easy to use but it takes terrible pictures at night. I have tried multiple settings to get clearer pictures after dark but can't seem to capture anything worth keeping.
customer_reviews.author: MLB1037

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use. It takes great pictures and although it would have been nice to have it take longer video I still am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steff

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for over three years now and it is an excellent buy...takes great pics and the functionality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: 720 P
customer_reviews.text: You can not take a movie with the 720p. It keep crashing. You must change it to a lower resolution .
customer_reviews.author: G.S

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Purchased as a gift for my wife and she loved it. Picture quality is great even when going from camera to computer. She loves the touch screen and ease of menu usage.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: good pictures this is the 2nd camera of this type due to wife dropping purse out of car at a store. needless to say i ran over it.. but it still took great pic's, just coulden't view them but pulled out the card and they were great pics. this camera is 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Norcross

customer_reviews.title: Great Pics Bad video
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for taking pictures. If you are buying this to take video forget it. Very grainy. You have to have perfect light for the video and even then it's not all that great. Takes great pics.
customer_reviews.author: John G. Cossin

customer_reviews.title: Battery died
customer_reviews.text: Purchased camera for christmas gift. The battery died and would not take a charge anymore 4 mths after Christmas. emailed seller, told to contact the camera manufacturer. = ( not happy. tested camera with friends battery. It worked. Now I have to see if I can get a new battery under warrenty or buy a new 1.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Vecchione

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I really love this Camera. It's easy to use and I like the touch panel. The screen is big and easy to view.
customer_reviews.author: MissK

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: was looking for somthing for our daughter. small with good qualities and priced right. Read the reviews of others and went with my gut feeling. Made the Right Choice. yes i would recommend it to others. Only wish i had this and not the one i got for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Jud

customer_reviews.title: Very slow in taking pictures
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace my 6 yr old Sony camera. I was hoping this would take faster pictures. Even after using a Sandisk EXTREME Class 6 SD Card the response time to take a picture was like 2-3 seconds. Ended up returning it.

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Good compact rich features. Nothing special about this but does what it is supposed to do. Entry level camear at a reasonable price.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my husband's birthday. It is easy to operate, and takes beautiful pictures. We couldn't be happier.

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S4000 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I would order from Ritz again... I couldn't believe the fast delivery, I received it the next day.... That was amazing... The price was compatible with stores and I didn't have to go anywhere to purchase it.. And this was one of the few company's to have the color i needed.

customer_reviews.text: It's good. It's not a professional camera. So if you are looking for a camera to take pictures just for fun,for vacations or something like that it's perfect. I just don't like the touch screen too much..

customer_reviews.title: great service
customer_reviews.text: Over all I`m very happy with the delivery and packing serivce.everything about the camera is great.The only thing I feel could be better with the product is when trying to take pictures the delay is longer than normal.The picture quality is great.I would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: 3 months and still working like the day i purchased
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been left in my vehicle countless times at -20 degree weather in ND and it still starts up and snaps photos like the day i got it. Nikon is a deffinte win!

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera! I wasn't sure if I would but I really like the LCD touch screen. The kids think it's great adding mustaches and writing on the pictures. The price was very reasonable for what you get! Only negative is the zoom lens is out when reviewing pictures so you can't lay it face down.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this camera to my sisters. They have been using it since last two years. It's working great..I would recommend this product to beginners

customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice and affordable camera.It was soo easy and simple to figure out how to work.The quality of the pictures are really nice.This is my first nikon and it doesn't dissappoint!

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with my camera. Compact so I carry it everywhere. Taking more pictures than I every have due to its size and ease of use. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rastalady

customer_reviews.title: All I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon S4000 has been a pleasure to use. Because it's so small, I have it with me much more - just drop it in my pocket when I walk out the door. I have not yet had to recharge the battery although I've used it a few weeks now. That was one of my concerns. The screen cleans easily with a microfiber cloth. The picture quality is very good for my use in taking casual photos. I recommend it.

product_meta.title: Nikon Coolpix S4000 12 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom and 3.0-Inch Touch-Panel LCD (Silver)
product_meta.description:
Color:SilverFROM THE MANUFACTURER


 Nikon's Coolpix S4000 creates touching memories by combining 12.0 effective megapixels, 4x wide-angle Zoom-Nikkor glass lens and an amazing 3.0-inch High Resolution HVGA (460k-dot) touch-panel LCD with sensitive touch. The Coolpix S4000 also features HD (720p) movies for high quality movie recording. The Coolpix S4000, with Nikon's EXPEED image processing concept, 4-way VR Image Stabilization System and Smart Portrait System enables you to get incredible pictures, incredibly easy. Nikon's Scene Auto Selector automatically analyses the scene you are taking and adjusts the scene mode for you. All you have to do is compose, then touch! 



Stylish design and intuitive touch-control operation over an exciting set of advanced functions for shooting and viewing 

Integrating elegant design and intuitive operation, Coolpix S4000 is a stylishly slim compact camera equipped with a touch screen interface that places a variety of controls at the fingertips. The Coolpix S4000's advanced functions and delightfully compact design makes picture-taking and playback more exciting. 

With a spacious 3-inch 460k-dot LCD featuring Nikon's Clear Color Display and intuitive fingertip shooting control, the Coolpix S4000 brings a new dimension of fun and visual beauty to photography. 

The Coolpix S4000 offers advanced shooting features that fully utilize the touch screen. With Touch Shutter, users can select their subject by a single touch on the screen to adjust focus and exposure, and to automatically release the shutter. White Balance can also be adjusted by touch in Food mode by dragging a finger to move the slider marker. The Coolpix S4000 is also equipped with Subject Tracking, which automatically follows and focuses on a subject selected by touch. 

Touch control also lends a new dimension of fun to viewing and retouching images. The speed and ease of fingertip scrolling through images and instant image selection makes other forms of control pale in comparison. Then there is the supplied stylus that can be used with a variety of input, retouch and image enhancement functions. Included is the Paint Function, which enables memos, drawings, colorful borders or stamps to be added directly to images. 

Another important feature of the Coolpix S4000 is its high performance imaging capabilities. 12.0 effective megapixels of sharp resolution is matched to the compositional freedom of a precision 4x zoom, Nikkor lens that ably covers focal lengths from 27-108mm (35mm format equivalent). Advanced digital image-processing faithfully reproduces fine details and subtle tones, delivers quick response, and maintains image quality and clarity when taking advantage of extended light sensitivity settings as high as ISO 3200. 



Nikon Coolpix S4000 Feature Highlights 

EXPEED digital imaging technology 
Nikon's smarter approach to digital imaging technology. From image capture to processing, Nikon's comprehensive EXPEED digital imaging concept encompasses the entire picture-taking operation. EXPEED is much more than a processing engine; it is a revolution in digital photography. 

3-inch, 460k-dot TFT LCD featuring Nikon's Clear Color Display with touch screen control 
The 3-inch LCD featuring Clear Color Display for the Coolpix S4000 is a delight to both the eyes and the fingers. Its large size and high-resolution make picture-taking and playback more enjoyable. The screen resists fingerprints, and features anti-reflection coating for better display in bright situations. 





High-Definition movie recording 
Entertain audiences with movies that capture the impact of the scene with HD. The Coolpix S4000 can shoot up to 1.5 hours* of HD movies (720p) with sound at 30fps. 
*Recording stops automatically after 29 minutes. This figure is based on in-house testing standards and stated for recording at 25°C with a fully charged EN-EL12 battery. Actual results may vary greatly depending on factors that include differences in ambient temperature, and the amount of zoom and autofocus operations used. 





Four advanced image stabilizing features* help ensure sharper results Nikon's Electronic VR image stabilization compensates for the effects of camera shake. Motion Detection automatically controls shutter speed and the ISO setting to compensate for subject movement as well as camera shake. ISO 3200 capability allows faster shutter speeds when shooting in low light or capturing fast-moving subjects. And, Nikon's original BSS (Best Shot Selector) function automatically shoots a series of sequential frames and saves the one with the sharpest focus.
* The camera selects and uses only the features required to optimize each image. 





Intelligent automation contributes to carefree shooting 
Nikon's Scene Auto Selector eliminates the need to manually select a scene mode to match the shot, and this makes it faster and easier to capture the moment in beautiful fashion. The Coolpix S4000 uses this intelligent function to analyze the subject and its surrounding settings and automatically selects the most appropriate of the following six scene modes to achieve optimal results--Portrait, Landscape, Night Portrait, Night Landscape, Close-up, or Backlight. 





Nikon's exclusive Smart Portrait System 
Automatically detecting as many as 12 faces in the shot, Face-priority AF helps produce satisfying portraits by adjusting focus and exposure. Smile Timer automatically releases the shutter when the priority subject smiles and offers the Blink Proof function, which automatically shoots two sequential frames and saves the one in which the subject's eyes are open-wide. Now featuring faster processing speed, In-Camera Red-Eye Fix automatically corrects perceived red-eye effect before saving the image to memory. 



Nikon Coolpix S4000 Other Features  * 16 scene modes for optimized shooting in various settings 
 * Scene Auto Selector 
 * D-Lighting 
 * Auto Sort function 
 * Quick Retouch 
 * Approx. 45 MB of internal memory 
 * USB charging via Charging AC Adapter EH-68P/EH-68P (AR) or PC 

What's in the Box  * EN-EL10 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery 
 * EH-68P AC Adapter/Charger 
 * UC-E6 USB Cable 
 * EG-CP14 Audio Video Cable 
 * AN-CP19 Strap 
 * Stylus TP-1 
 * Coolpix Software Suite CD-ROM
feature_bullets: 12.0 megapixels for stunning prints as large as 16 x 20 inches
Bright 3.0-inch touch-panel LCD; Sensitive Response Touch Panel; Touch Shutter and Autofocus
4-way VR Image Stabilization System; Smart Portrait System
